And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> bowed down <S%H7812>himself<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>

My <S%H113>lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hearken<s%> unto me: the <S%H776>land<s%> is worth <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver;<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> me and thee? <S%H6912>bury<s%> therefore thy <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H6085>Ephron;<s%> and <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%> to <S%H6085>Ephron<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H1696>named<s%> in the <S%H241>audience<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2845>Heth,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8255>shekels<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> <S%H5674>current<s%> money with the <S%H5503>merchant.<s%>

And the <S%H7704>field<s%> of <S%H6085>Ephron,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was in <S%H4375>Machpelah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4471>Mamre,<s%> the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and the <S%H4631>cave<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was therein, and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> were in <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1366>borders<s%> round <S%H5439>about,<s%> were made <S%H6965>sure<s%>
